official_title: A bill to amend Section 206 of the Reclamation Project Authorization Act of 1972 (Public Law 92-514; 86 Stat. 964).
short_title: Brantley Project, Pecos River Basin, New Mexico, Reauthorization Act of 1979

summary.text: Brantley Project, Pecos River Basin, New Mexico, Reauthorization Act of 1979 - Amends the Reclamation Project Authorization Act of 1972 to increase the amount authorized to be appropriated for construction of the Brantley project in the Pecos River Basin, New Mexico.

titles.title: Brantley Project, Pecos River Basin, New Mexico, Reauthorization Act of 1979
A bill to amend Section 206 of the Reclamation Project Authorization Act of 1972 (Public Law 92-514; 86 Stat. 964).
